content.description:
This line starts with your left hand on a blocky, triangular undercling and your right hand on a flat edge just above it, and without using the pedestal, do a large jump move right hand to a good edge in the face. Then finish the same as

The Ghost Inside

.
content.location: This climb is located on the far right side of the cliff band just to the right of a small tree.

content.description:
Start with your left hand on a blocky undercling and your right hand on the flat edge. Do a hard jump move without using the pedestal to an edge in the middle of the face, and finish the same as

Mongrel Heart

.
content.location: It is on the far right side of the cliffband just to the right of a small tree.

content.description:
This bouldering problem starts on the jug around the rail the same as for the

Ghost Inside

. Instead of heading straight up compressing, head out right through edges on the face without using the pedestal, and do a large jump move to a fragile jug at the lip.
content.location: This boulder is on the far right side of the cliff band just to the right of a small tree.

content.description:
Start from a sit on underclings at the bottom of a crack. Do a few underling moves up the crack until you can reach a crimp above, and do a small jump to a jug. Top out onto a large ledge above through some jugs.

There is a possible left exit that would trend left across the face instead of through the jugs. It is a bit dirty and needs more cleaning.
content.location: It is on the far left side of the wall.

content.description: This problem starts on the obvious jug on the left of the arete/rail and continues directly up the wall without using the pedestal compressing between the rail on the left and holds on the face until you reach the jug at the peak of the wall.
content.location: This boulder is on the far right side of the cliff band to the right of a small tree.
